translator_notes: Chapter 5 title here differs from common versions - '开生面梦演红楼梦 立新场情传幻境情' vs the more common '贾宝玉神游太虚境 警幻仙曲演红楼梦'
Chapter 17 and 18 share the same title because they were originally one chapter that was split
The page numbers in this TOC refer to the PDF's internal numbering, not the printed page numbers
'葫芦僧乱判葫芦案' (Chapter 4) is a pun - 葫芦 (gourd/calabash) sounds like 糊涂 (muddle-headed)
'风月鉴' (Mirror of Romance) in Chapter 12 is a magical mirror that shows one's true desires
research_notes: This edition uses variant chapter titles from the Zhiping manuscripts rather than the more widely circulated Cheng-Gao edition titles
The table of contents shows this is the first of multiple pages listing all 80 chapters
